description: Lightweight, versatile and packable, this splash jacket features neoprene "hook & loop" wrist closures, "hook & loop" adjustable neoprene waist, and an adjustable gusseted neoprene splash collar. The Hydrus 2.5 waterproof breathable fabric keeps you comfortable and dry. The jacket also features a self draining sleeve pocket.
name: Kokatat Stance Jacket - Mens
